𓈍 #xaʳ #kha 𓏏·𜐟 crown 𓐍 𓂝 𓈍 ⲭⲗⲟⲙ 𓈍 ⇔ 𓎝 󴤂 ϭⲓⲭⲗⲟⲙ نجcتهختو ⲭⲗⲟⲙⲗⲉⲙ Kremlin! ⲥⲱⲟⲩ

𓈍 crown Ⅱ. cairn 𓈏 Ⅲ. gear Ⅳ. scorn Ⅴ. coming

𓈍 ≈ 𓏏·𜐟 Originally rising sun with rays 󴂩 󴂪 󴂧 𓈍 ≈ 𓏏·𜐟 ≈ 𓇶 inverted ⇔ sun rise 𓈌 dawn
𓈍 ≈ 𒄑𒆪 ≈ 旦 dàn ≈ 𓆓 𓇳 𓈖 dawn ⇔ turn
𓈍 ≈ 𒄑𒆪 ≈ 旭 ≈ 昏 ≈ 曙 ≈ 署 ≈ 罒者 ≈ 耂日 ≈ 丿土日 ≈ 伞日 ≈ ⺜𓇳

Khasekhemwy ca. 2690 BC

𓃫 󳲌 𓈍 𓌂 𓌂 / 𓅄 𓃫 󴊇 𓈍 𓌂 𓌂 / 𓃫 󴊇 𓈍 𓌂 Ḫꜥj-sḫm.wj also Kha-sekhemui ≈ 2686 BC Chronos? Founding father of great 3rd dynasty Krathos? 𓌂 #xrp > Kraft κρατία

𓈍 𓅡 Khaba 2643–2637 BC

𓇳 𓈍 𓂝 𓆑 Khafre:Chéphren, brother of Kheper, sons of king Khufu

crown

𓋴 𓈍 𓂝 𓂋 𓀁 | enrage | scorn
